__e: She beats a retreat in the face of the Sicilian gambit.
If you don't retreat now, you'll get nothing but a corpse.
You might want to consider falling back.
She has just given up a battle and in a strange way retreated, but this has been a retreat back to reality.
These river valleys become critically important for how human history will now be played out following the retreat of these ice sheets.
I have come to negotiate a Federation withdrawal, not to be dictated to by some mere captain.
We demand an immediate withdraw of the U. S. Naval strike force by this time tomorrow... the american troops are still in position near our country.
By abandoning Moscow, we'll be laying a deadly trap for the foe.
